00003 #include "ORIP320ADCDecoder.hh"
00004 #include "ORLogger.hh"

00006 std::string ORIP320ADCDecoder::GetParName( size_t iPar )
00007 {
00008   switch(iPar) {
00009     case 0: return "Crate";
00010     case 1: return "Card";
00011     case 2: return "IP Slot";
00012     case 3: return "Time";
00013     case 4: return "Channel";
00014     case 5: return "ADC";
00015     default:
00016       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetParName(): index (" << iPar
00017                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00018       return "unknown";
00019   }
00020 }
00021 
00022 UInt_t ORIP320ADCDecoder::GetPar( UInt_t* record, 
00023                                   size_t iPar, 
00024                                   size_t iRow )
00025 {
00026   switch(iPar) {
00027     case 0: return CrateOf( record );
00028     case 1: return CardOf( record );
00029     case 2: return IPSlotNumberOf( record );
00030     case 3: return TimeOf( record );
00031     case 4: return ChannelOf( record, iRow );
00032     case 5: return ADCValueOf( record, iRow );
00033     default:
00034       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetParName(): index (" << iPar
00035                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00036       return 0;
00037   }
00038 }
